title: Analyze Impact of a New Bike Lane
description: A new protected bike lane was recently installed. A planner wants to see its impact on traffic speed and cyclist volume.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical traffic speed data for the street before and after the bike lane installation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the two datasets for comparison.

tasks.description: Retrieve data from bicycle counters along the new lane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the cyclist volume data.

tasks.description: Generate a comparative report showing that vehicle speeds decreased by 5% while cyclist volume increased by 200%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report summarizing the project's impact.
